question: According to the recent report by the global navigation tech firm TomTom, which is the worldâ€™s most traffic congested city?
explanation:
According to the recent report by the Netherlands-based global navigation tech firm- TomTom, Bengaluru is named as the world\'s most traffic congested city. In the list comprising of 415 other cities across 57 countries of the world, Bengaluru was placed in the first spot, according to the data in 2019.
This year, the firm has released its ninth annual traffic index. The capital city of Philippines, Manila was ranked second in the list. Other Indian cities which found place in the list are: Mumbai, Pune and New Delhi in the 4th, 5th and 8th positions respectively.
